text: SummerSlam (2012) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by WWE. It was held on August 19, 2012 at the Staples Center in Los Angeles, California. It was the twenty-fifth yearly SummerSlam event that was held by the WWE. ==Matches== # Matches Stipulations Times Pre-show Antonio Cesaro (with Aksana) defeated Santino Marella (c) Singles match for the WWE United States Championship 5:08 1 Chris Jericho defeated Dolph Ziggler (with Vickie Guerrero) Singles match 13:05 2 Daniel Bryan defeated Kane Singles match 8:02 3 The Miz (c) defeated Rey Mysterio Singles match for the WWE Intercontinental Championship 9:09 4 Sheamus (c) defeated Alberto Del Rio (with Ricardo Rodriguez) Singles match for the World Heavyweight Championship 11:22 5 R-Truth and Kofi Kingston (c) defeated Prime Time Players (Titus O'Neil and Darren Young) Tag team match for the WWE Tag Team Championship 7:07 6 CM Punk (c) defeated John Cena and The Big Show Triple threat match for the WWE Championship 12:34 7 Brock Lesnar (with Paul Heyman) defeated Triple H Singles match 18:45 (c) â€“ refers to the champion(s) heading into the match ==References== ==Other websites== *Official SummerSlam 2012 website Category:2012 in professional wrestling Category:SummerSlam Category:Sports in Los Angeles Category:2012 in American television Category:2010s in Los Angeles, California Category:2012 in California
title: SummerSlam (2012)
